com.ogprover.prover_protocol.cp.auxiliary
Class PointsPositionChecker

java.lang.Object
  com.ogprover.prover_protocol.cp.auxiliary.PointsPositionChecker
Direct Known Subclasses:
FourPointsPositionChecker, ThreePointsPositionChecker, TwoPointsPositionChecker
public abstract class PointsPositionChecker
extends java.lang.Object

Class description:
Abstract class for checking whether certain points' positions correspond to specified NDG condition

Version:
1.00
Author:
Ivan Petrovic
